snippet: The move by President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia to establish a mixed electoral system would alter the way seats are filled in the State Duma, the lower house of Parliament, and could help solidify his power.
abstract: Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin orders major change in rules for parliamentary elections, move that could help solidify his power and influence toward the end of his current term and insulate him from dwindling public support for United Russia, party that nominated him and currently holds majority in Parliament.
lead_paragraph: The move by President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia to establish a mixed electoral system would alter the way seats are filled in the State Duma, the lower house of Parliament, and could help solidify his power.

headline.seo: Putin Orders New System for Russian Parliamentary Elections
headline.main: Putin Orders Change in Election Rules
headline.print_headline: Putin Orders Change in Election Rules
